channel.title: TaintedPKZ Re-Opened -Lets get creative- (Now recruiting)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dcturl.png[/img] [u][b]-TaintedPkz-[/b][/u] No this is not a old school remake this is going to just be a fun based server with what we hope to be a big fan base and player base we are currently looking for some people intrested in joining we are currently trying to fill out these postitions. [u][b]Information:[/b][/u] Server Name: TaintedPKZ Developers: pkerjosh Forums: Needs Approval Price Guide: Coming Soon [u][b] What We are looking For:[/b][/u] Server Coder 1/3 (me) Client Coder 1/2 (me) Html Creator 1/2 (me) Forums 0/2 Hoster 0/1 [u][b]Fill This in:[/b][/u]
Name: Age: Position: Msn: Skype: Years Of Coding: Can I trust You: Any Proof?:

item.title: TaintedPKZ Re-Opened -Lets get creative- (Now recruiting)
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

According to your banner this looks like a 508… If you banner is actual pictures of the server it looks quite nice but other than that you have no features or goals or media. So I will ask you maybe to update this much more as your server gets bigger… Because I do see you just posted this so good luck for now I like to see more 508’s in the community. I hope you go through with this and don’t drop it after a month or so. Good luck

Read full topic
